title: Corki is like Ezreal on steroids
body:
So...Corki is currently sitting at a 55% win rate mid. According to champion.gg he has zero counters. Like Ezreal, he has amazing mixed damage and a lot of range, but unlike Ezreal he doesn't have mana issues and he isn't squishy. So please tell me how are you supposed to deal with him.

Yea...meant to post this in Gameplay. My bad.

http://champion.gg/champion/Corki/Middle
